accommodations.description: Student learning and behavior supports (e.g., IEP/504/testing accommodations) with effective dates, responsible staff, and notesâ€”used to inform instruction and compliance reporting.

academic_terms.description: Definition of academic terms (semesters, trimesters, marking periods) including start/end dates and grading cycles; drives scheduling, transcripts, and reporting timelines.

organizations.description: Organizations within the district (district office, departments, schools). Provides the parent container for governance and SIS records.

bodies.description: Governing bodies and committees (e.g., Board of Education, advisory councils).

entity_tags.description: Tagging table for attaching classification labels to entities (folders, people, records) for organization and search.

person.description: People directory (students, guardians, staff). Stores identity and cross-table references.

person_address.description: Postal addresses for people; supports history and multiple address types.

person_contact.description: Contact methods for people (email, phone). Includes preferred flags and verification status.

sis_behavior_codes.description: Dictionary of behavior/discipline codes used by SIS events and referrals.

goals.description: Student goals for academics, behavior, or support plans, including owner and target dates.

plans.description: Student support plans (IEP/504, MTSS/RTI, custom interventions) with milestones and progress tracking.

personal_notes.description: Private staff notes about a student/person with role-based access controls.

payments.description: Money received or owed (fees, activities, meals) captured as integer cents to avoid float errors.

periods.description: Time periods/terms (quarters/semesters) and attendance schedule anchors.

events.description: Calendar or transactional events used by orders/registrations and audit trails.

orders.description: Purchases/registrations linked to events and users; totals are stored in cents.

users.description: Application users (linked to Keycloak). Stores app-specific attributes/flags.
